changes.title: Add comprehensive reference documentation and internet access research
changes.description: Created TOOLS-REFERENCE.md documenting all 53 MCP tools across 3 servers. Updated index.html with current tool counts (personas-mcp: 8 tools, docs-mcp: 37 tools, coderef-mcp: 8 tools). Created MCP-INTERNET-ACCESS-GUIDE.md with comprehensive research on deployment platforms, authentication methods, and security best practices for exposing MCP servers over the internet.
changes.reason: Need centralized documentation for all available MCP tools and research on how to securely expose servers for remote access (ChatGPT integration, CI/CD, etc.)
changes.impact: Users now have quick reference guides for all 53 tools and comprehensive guidance on internet deployment options including Railway, Cloudflare, AWS, and authentication methods.
